title: Hamburger

description: Hamburger focuses on the fast food industry; providing an insight into the two largest hamburger chains in the world; MacDonalds and Burger King. These two fast food chains have made a dramatic impact, not only on the food industry itself; but on the social and economic lives of individuals. The fast food market has been revolutionised into an industrial process which has had a serious impact on the environment. A powerful documentary in two episodes: Big Mac" and "International Mincemeat.
